abstract: Trapped in a cycle of systemic cultural bias
description: "Everyday" racism escalates into violence as an indigenous school boy is forced to fight for dignity. When he is framed for drugs by a racist student, he realizes he is trapped in a cycle of systemic cultural bias. Cast: George Barker, Shannon Cole
